wpt.name: GC22B0
wpt.desc: White Point by TVN & PDD, Virtual Cache (1/1)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: White Point
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: This park is one of the most visited sites in Charleston. It features beautiful live oaks, incredible views and many historical monuments and memorials.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
This area was named "White Point" or "Oyster Point" in 1670 by the original colonists of Charles Town. Learn a lot of history, have a relaxing picnic lunch, enjoy a leisurely stroll and great views.

To log the cache, locate the coordinates above and email the two years found on the Geodetic Survey marker (small brass disc set into concrete). How accurate was your GPS?

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Windy at the point tonight! Or is it like that all the time?
